data.title: British war collection 2
data.meta_description: Reach for the sky: THis is the remarkable true story of Douglas Bader who overcomes every obstacle to prove his worth. We dive at dawn: British submarine Sea Tiger is instructed to find and destroy a Nazi battleship, the Brandenburg. The way ahead: A motley crew of young recruits as they learn to become soldiers and must prove themselves against the enemy. The one that got away: This is the dramatic true story of Franz Von Werra, the only German prisoner-of-war in Britain to escape and return to his homeland.
